manifest.name: direction
manifest.description: Detect directionality: left-to-right, right-to-left, or neutral

scripts.build: npm run build-bundle && npm run build-mangle
scripts.test: npm run format && npm run build && npm run test-coverage

manifest.readme:
# direction

[![Build][build-badge]][build]
[![Coverage][coverage-badge]][coverage]
[![Downloads][downloads-badge]][downloads]
[![Size][size-badge]][size]

Detect direction: left-to-right, right-to-left, or neutral.

## API

Install:

```sh
npm install direction
```

Use:

```js
var direction = require('direction')

direction('A') // => 'ltr'
direction('anglais') // => 'ltr'
direction('بسيطة') // => 'rtl'
direction('@') // => 'neutral'
```

## CLI

Install:

```sh
npm install -g direction
```

Use:

```txt
Usage: direction [options] <words...>

Detect directionality: left-to-right, right-to-left, or neutral

Options:

  -h, --help           output usage information
  -v, --version        output version number

Usage:

# output directionality
$ direction @
# neutral

# output directionality from stdin
$ echo 'الانجليزية' | direction
# rtl
```
